## Classes

### nfs

== Class: nfs

Manages NFS

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `nfs` class.

##### `hiera_hash`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `nfs_package`

Data type: `Variant[Array, String]`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `nfs_service`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `nfs_service_ensure`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `nfs_service_enable`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `mounts`

Data type: `Variant[Undef, Hash]`



Default value: `undef`

##### `server`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### `exports_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: '/etc/exports'

##### `exports_owner`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'root'

##### `exports_group`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'root'

##### `exports_mode`

Data type: `Pattern[/^[0-7]{4}$/]`



Default value: '0644'

### nfs::idmap

== Class: nfs::idmap

Manages idmapd

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `nfs::idmap` class.

##### `idmap_package`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `idmapd_conf_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: '/etc/idmapd.conf'

##### `idmapd_conf_owner`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'root'

##### `idmapd_conf_group`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'root'

##### `idmapd_conf_mode`

Data type: `Pattern[/^[0-7]{4}$/]`



Default value: '0644'

##### `idmapd_service_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `idmapd_service_ensure`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'USE_DEFAULTS'

##### `idmapd_service_enable`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `idmapd_service_hasstatus`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `idmapd_service_hasrestart`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### `idmap_domain`

Data type: `String`



Default value: $::domain

##### `ldap_server`

Data type: `Variant[Undef, String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### `ldap_base`

Data type: `Variant[Undef, String, Array]`



Default value: `undef`

##### `local_realms`

Data type: `Variant[String, Array]`



Default value: $::domain

##### `translation_method`

Data type: `Variant[Array,
    Pattern[/^(nsswitch|umich_ldap|static)$/]
  ]`



Default value: 'nsswitch'

##### `nobody_user`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'nobody'

##### `nobody_group`

Data type: `String`



Default value: 'nobody'

##### `verbosity`

Data type: `Integer`



Default value: 0

##### `pipefs_directory`

Data type: `Variant[Undef, Stdlib::Absolutepath]`



Default value: `undef`
